::Battera::

She looked up a bot she had never met before.(Prowl) And then looked 
at Iron Raptor. She swallowed hard, trying to recover about  the new 
of the base being abandonded.  "ah...I'm sorry to bother you again.  
But, I have a friend arriving.  He's a predacon too," she looked 
around kind of nervously. "But I was wondering if he may be allowed 
access. He's just as dedicated to peace as I am.  He wants to help.  
He's returning from a talk with the other preds.  Now all we have to 
do it.."  She walked over to Iron Raptor.  "I am here to officially 
here to invite you to our Peace Embassy.  My friend Vulois is hosting 
the first session of Peace talks.  We are getting all the group 
leaders together to talk about putting an end to the war.  That is 
why I am here.  We are working for peace and an end to the war.  Will 
you please atend the meeting and join me and my friend to the 
Embassy?  We will be giving you escort. If you like, you may bring a 
friend or two.  Please join us." she said with a warm, friendly smile.

She had waited for a long time to ask the leader this question.  And 
now she had completed her mission.  Well, the first half of it.  She 
had tried so hard to help bring an end to the war and bring about a 
peace between the groups.  Now she hoped her dream would become a 
reality.  She smiled at the thought of walking around in the 
landscape and not getting attacked.
